Name: Battery size cell variation
Description: The electrical properties of a standard battery size vary and are dependent on the cell technology used.  This type allows these variations to be noted.

Properties.Name: Capacity
Properties.Description: The charge deliverable from this battery

Properties.Name: Cell type
Properties.Description: The cell technology used in this battery size cell variation

Properties.Name: Energy
Properties.Description: The maximum energy stored in this battery

Properties.Name: Voltage
Properties.Description: The maximum electric potential difference achievable across the battery under normal operating conditions
